rows.label: qst100702_msg0001
rows.name:
And-a-one Nopon Doubloon!
And-a-two Nopon Doubloons!
Nopon Doubloons everywhere!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0002
rows.name:
Say what!
All eleven, all here?!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0003
rows.name:
Business sense of Nunui is
honed to fine point!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0004
rows.name:
Now, collected Nopon Doubloons
go in slot on treasure trove!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0005
rows.name:
A-one and a-two, a-three-four-five,
a-six, and a-seven, eight-a-nine-a-ten!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0006
rows.name:
Aaand eleven!
...Time is come for opening!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0007
rows.name:
What inside, meh?
What inside, m- ...Meh?

rows.label: qst100702_msg0008
rows.name:
This is...priceless accessories and
Core Chips! This extremely valuable!
Nunui could buy whole ship!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0009
rows.name:
...Huh?
Something written on paper here?

rows.label: qst100702_msg0010
rows.name:
"I, the undersigned,
promise to repay in full..."

rows.label: qst100702_msg0011
rows.name:
"the sum of one million G lent to me by
the Pyrithium Trade Guild Chairman."

rows.label: qst100702_msg0012
rows.name:
...That number make mind boggle...
Who get themself in this kind of debt?!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0013
rows.name:
"So help me the Architect.
 Signed: Seiryuu"

rows.label: qst100702_msg0014
rows.name:
Seiryuu?
Name sound familiar...

rows.label: qst100702_msg0015
rows.name:
Oh-ho, who knew that records of
that loan would remain?!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0016
rows.name:
I was younger back then...
Though I did look older, admittedly...

rows.label: qst100702_msg0017
rows.name:
Gramps, what the heck did you need
a loan for?!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0018
rows.name:
Well, you see, that's...
I may have been a little hard up...

rows.label: qst100702_msg0019
rows.name: Meh? The little creature is Seiryuu?

rows.label: qst100702_msg0020
rows.name:
Indeed, I am Seiryuu!
The reasons why I reverted to infancy
are perhaps too long to get into now...

rows.label: qst100702_msg0021
rows.name:
Ah!!!
Nunui remember now!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0022
rows.name:
When I still littlepon,
Grannypon tell me this
fairy-tale...

rows.label: qst100702_msg0023
rows.name:
About the time she lend money to
huge Divine Beast named Seiryuu!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0024
rows.name: So it not a fairy-tale after all!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0025
rows.name:
Fairy-tales about money-lending?
Haha, that's just like the
Pyrithium Trade Guild I knew!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0026
rows.name:
This isn't the time for reminiscing,
Gramps!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0027
rows.name:
Please tell me you've
returned the money?

rows.label: qst100702_msg0028
rows.name: ...I did not.

rows.label: qst100702_msg0029
rows.name: Of course you didn't...

rows.label: qst100702_msg0030
rows.name:
The treasures we just uncover
are collateral of Seiryuu.

rows.label: qst100702_msg0031
rows.name:
Nunui cannot very well go
ahead and liquidate asset...
Would be bad form.

rows.label: qst100702_msg0032
rows.name:
Will dream of restoring
Pyrithium Trade Guild die here...?

rows.label: qst100702_msg0033
rows.name: Gramps.

rows.label: qst100702_msg0034
rows.name: Y-yes?

rows.label: qst100702_msg0035
rows.name:
You borrowed the money because you
really needed it, right?

rows.label: qst100702_msg0036
rows.name:
O-of course!
Would I pawn all these precious
treasures for no good reason?!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0037
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]I don't think I can tell them it was
to keep my girlfriend happy...

rows.label: qst100702_msg0038
rows.name: ...Here's what we do.

rows.label: qst100702_msg0039
rows.name: Nunui, I'll pay back the money.

rows.label: qst100702_msg0040
rows.name:
Y-you will, Rex?
But it's a million gold!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0041
rows.name:
We could just relinquish the treasure
and call it a day...

rows.label: qst100702_msg0042
rows.name:
Nope! Line seven of the Salvager Code
clearly stipulates, "Never leave a debt
unpaid"!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0043
rows.name: Rex...

rows.label: qst100702_msg0044
rows.name: Such wonderful code!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0045
rows.name:
Then it settled!
Friends pay back the
million G friends owe!

rows.label: qst100702_msg0046
rows.name:
We will for sure!
Right, Gramps?

rows.label: qst100702_msg0047
rows.name:
Yes, Rex...
Thank you, Rex...

rows.label: qst100702_msg0048
rows.name:
Then friends just let Nunui know
when friends have the money.

rows.label: qst100702_msg0049
rows.name:
Until then, Nunui will continue to study
wisdom of Bahn. I feel I on verge of
real breakthrough!
